headline: Jim Cramer Sees Opportunity in Consolidated Edison (ED) – A Safe Utility Bet!
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Looked At These 23 Stocks Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Consolidated Edison, Inc. (NYSE:ED) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer looked at recently. Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, offered an optimistic perspective on the market on […]
